revised_title: Investigating the Electrical Response of Nerve to a Single Stimulus Using the Capillary Electrometer
tldr: The authors, F. Gotch and G. J. Burch, successfully measure the electromotive changes in nerve response to a single stimulus using a capillary electrometer. They provide detailed descriptions of their experimental setup and findings, including the effects of different stimulus intensities and the role of the electrometer contacts' positions on the nerve.
